subject: Soccer
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Carli Lloyd scored on a deflected shot in the 39th minute to give the United States a 1-0 victory over host Sweden in a women’s Olympic tuneup in Skelleftea. Lloyd dribbled past three defenders inside the box, then fired a low left-footed shot that glanced off Sara Thunebro’s leg and past goalkeeper Hedvig Lindahl. The win was the United States’ 20th straight this year.
